subject: Personal Finance
title: Recency Bias
description: A quick win: understand Recency Bias.

hook.text: Your portfolio gained 20% last year. You feel invincible. Last year's returns say nothing about next year.

buildup.text: Recency bias overweights recent events when predicting the future.

discovery.text: After a bull market, investors take excessive risk. After a crash, they avoid stocks for years.

twist.text: Market performance over any 1-year period is a terrible predictor of the next year. Yet it drives behavior.

climax.text: Long-term data shows stocks return about 10% annually. But annual returns vary wildly around that average.

punchline.text: Recent performance is a lousy crystal ball.

quiz.question: What is recency bias?
options: Overweighting recent events when predicting the future
